0:
”Alexa, open Ida B. Wells facts”
”Alexa, start Ida B. Wells facts”
”Alexa, launch Ida B. Wells facts”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: ida b. wells facts
des: Alexa skill to enlighten users with Ida B Wells facts to help them add to their knowledge of this pioneering American who overcame all manner of threats while exposing the brutality of lynching and civil-rights issues of the time. This skill also provides facts about some of her personal history such as marital status, schools she attended, the number of children she had, entreprenuership, etc.
